mapper.select: SELECT RESVE_NO, RESVE_DE, RESVE_TM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE = RESVE_TM) AS RESVE_TM_TXT, BLD_CODE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE = BLD_CODE) AS BLD_NM, MSSR_EMPNO, (SELECT NCNM FROM MASSEUR WHERE EMPNO = MSSR_EMPNO) AS NCNM, BED_CODE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE = BED_CODE) AS BED_NM, RESVE_EMPNO, WAIT_EMPNO, REG_EMPNO, REG_DT, UPDT_EMPNO, UPDT_DT FROM RESVE_STTUS WHERE (RESVE_EMPNO = #{empNo} OR WAIT_EMPNO = #{empNo})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESVE_STTUS WHERE (RESVE_EMPNO = #{empNo} OR WAIT_EMPNO = #{empNo})
